bibl.title: Papyrology, Ptolemaic Egypt and Byzantine Palestine.

series.title: Österreichische Akademie der Wissenschaften. Philosophisch-historische Klasse. Kommission für antike Rechtsgeschichte. Papyrologica Vindobonensia.

bibl.note: Talk delivered at the opening of the Congress. - I. Ethnic tension in Ptolemaic Egypt attested by Theokritos' Adoniazousai (in part. lines 46-50). - II. The Oracle of the Potter. - III. The carbonized Petra papyri.
